title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-6.1 - Exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-6.1 - Exemptions

State Regulations

Nothing in this Part shall apply to products, fabrics or
related materials in inventory or trade as of the date on which the standard
applicable thereto becomes effective, provided however, that in order to
effectuate the purposes of article 29 of the General Business Law, such
exemption may be withdrawn or limited under conditions prescribed by the

Industrial Commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
80-6.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
